results.title: The Airport
results.brief_description: Bridget Robertson goes to the airport to collect her sister’s body. She reflects on Tina’s life, cut short at 25 in a motor bike accident.

results.brief_description: Cartoon style computer animated tale of the hunt for food by two enterprising and determined squirrels. The chase is on.

results.title: Plant nurturing
results.brief_description: Select the correct answer and nurture the plant. The longer it takes for you to give the right answers, the longer it takes for the plant to grow. An interactive game.

results.title: Renegade
results.brief_description: As Agent Renegade it is your mission to save the world from destruction by the alien monsters. This is a fast-paced action-packed game that plays on your reflexes and hand/eye co-ordination.

results.title: Space colony
results.brief_description: Interactive game where you create your own city with each residential structure being sufficiently resourced with food, water and energy to maintain the population. The player wins the game when they have reached the target population of 10,000. Based on real time strategy and city simulation games.

results.title: The Crab game
results.brief_description: The Crab Game is divided into two parts with each part taking place in different settings. The crab is the main character, a superhero, who can save the world from a dropping water level by recollecting all the water drops before time runs out.

results.title: Metropollen
results.brief_description: This interactive game allows the users to create a visually stunning showcase of abstract art that intertwines properties of both nature and technology by cultivating a garden of urban city structures.

results.title: Ciliated thought
results.brief_description:
This project is based upon an exploration of themes and imagery from the novel “Bend Sinister” by Vladimir Nabokov.
Fragments from a story about love and loss…among other things.

results.title: The Fall and rise of Marla's eyes
results.brief_description:
A twisted tale about a little girl named Marla who lives in a small town named Glebe. Marla has an odd hobby, an obsession - she collects human eyes.
Presented as an interactive on-line storybook illustrated by Alexandra Zhadan and written by N.J. Hunter.
